html:
7.30.20  8:47 pm   Regarding creating content-so I'm finally doing the the thing I've always wanted to do, but struggle with a fear of constantly second guessing myself and always wondering if it's good enough. Any recommendations on how to stop that trend and just do the thing?

      all it takes is to get scared you never will

7.30.20  8:17 pm   What project are you currently working on?

     videomaking

      Is it another video? 

     that doesn't sound like enough videos

7.30.20  8:12 pm   Are there any other artists that inspire you?

      all of them, but it's even more fun when they say they're not an artist, and they are. Or, when they say they are an artist, but they're not. i appreciate a good surprise

7.30.20  8:05 pm   is part of the purpose of your content expressing that we have all these strange thoughts ie. random words popping up ?

      no

7.30.20  7:46 pm   help I need to write a song in two days how do I do it

      just use 1 note. that may narrow it down

7.30.20  6:45 pm   is @billwurtzofficial on tiktok you?

      absolutely not.

7.30.20  6:42 pm   what's the best type of bagel

      maybe one without a hole in it for once

7.30.20  6:39 pm   Do your lyrics actually have metaphors where people think "this is just nonsense that randomly came to his mind" or is it more common that people read too much into the lyrics? 

      if you hear the music with it it should all make sense

7.30.20  6:29 pm   what phase/stage are you in rn

      agony systems development

7.30.20  6:15 pm   Hi Bill. I love music and performing but I am really bad at singing in front of people (apart from my close friends and immediate family) as my voice becomes shaky and off pitch. At times I have been able to control my nerves and shakiness but usually I am unable to control it. Any ideas on how to control this?
Also, thanks for being awesome.

      the more you do this the easier it will get. But to find real pitch truly and emotionally with the room, you should look around and know the shape of the room. be friends with it. you might even find some ghosts being summoned up, if you do it right

7.30.20  6:07 pm   are you on tiktok or is billwurtzofficial a fake account from a fan

      that is fake. i would never use the word 'official', but even worse i would never post wide videos to a tall screen. i already have square versions of all those videos, so at least that would be better, but i would re-edit them for vertical, Actually better yet i would post new videos entirely

7.30.20  6:03 pm   Do you know just how much you mean to me?

      no but now i am curious

7.30.20  5:11 pm   Would you like to create your own artistic universe?

      more than 1

7.30.20  5:02 pm   are you honest?

      i was going to say no but now that i think about it yes

7.30.20  4:55 pm   what does the world need right now

     another world, to be friends with

7.30.20  4:20 pm   Do you carry around a designated sheet-music notebook with you to jot down songs in?

     no

      If so, is there a particular one you'd recommend?

     nowadays i recommend an audio recorder, which is built in to most mobile devices nowadays

7.30.20  4:12 pm   why do none of my socks match

      because each sock is a unique creation forged in the heavens

7.30.20  4:01 pm   when you make music videos that feature actual footage of you, do you record yourself miming each part all the way through and pick and choose which bits to include later? or do you already have a roadmap for how the video is going to be arranged before you start recording?

      i've done it both ways

7.30.20  3:45 pm   This is not a question, just an encouraging comment. You make Great video's, and music. 

      we'll see about that....

7.30.20  3:29 pm   are you running against kanye for president

      i was going to say no but now that i think about it yes

7.30.20  3:12 pm   how do you get over something embarrassing you did in the past? 

      do a new and improved embarrassing thing

7.30.20  2:17 pm   What's your favourite sound from nature?

      rain

7.30.20  1:48 pm   im not having a good time. in fact, its kind of a bad time that im having. how can i change that to make it be a better time?

      make it into a folk tale. folk tales have bad and good times in them, but that's on purpose, because it makes the folk tale good

7.30.20  1:46 pm   my dad makes me practice the piano. everyone says I'll be happy he forced me to do it when i'm older. will I?

     i've never met anyone who was happy they were forced to do it. i've only met people who no longer do it, because they were forced to do it

     and when hes too old to stop me what should i force him to do as payback?

     play the piano

7.30.20  12:45 pm   bill wurtz, I am not sure what I am going to do with my life and how I am going to do it. The more I learn about the world, the more confusing it gets. do you have any advice?

      this may seem unexpected, but you might be the one who is supposed to explain to others why it makes sense

7.30.20  12:06 pm   Favorite Song?

      i haven't found it yet, that's why i keep making new ones just in case

7.30.20  11:04 am   Why are you literally the best person ever?

      the system may be rigged

7.30.20  10:01 am   Favourite name?

      horn

7.30.20  9:49 am   What music do you listen to?

      respectful

7.30.20  9:41 am   do you have a tiktok

      not yet

7.30.20  9:26 am   What genres of music influenced you the most?

      normal, regular,

7.30.20  9:05 am   do you prefer getting the more philosophical questions or the more genuine questions?

      don't you get it, philosophy is genuine

7.30.20  8:59 am   favourite jingle from "history of the entire world, i guess"

      that's a human person

7.30.20  8:44 am   What's your favorite chord in music?

      still searching for it. that's why i keep changing chords

7.30.20  7:22 am   Say, if you were to make a 3D Video (which I'm pretty sure you already are), is it going to be in your signature, neon bright and weird style?

      we'll see

7.30.20  7:19 am   How many times is people asking things related to the video "i did a bad thing"?

      2 or 3

7.30.20  7:10 am   Does time exist

      it's in the process of existing

7.30.20  6:33 am   Why and since when is music your hobby?

      forever but it's also an urgent scientific pursuit

7.30.20  6:25 am   why is your songs so catchy send help

      i will send more songs, hopefully that will help

7.30.20  6:21 am   how do you know so much?

     i've guessed

     how to become like you?

     become like you

7.30.20  6:19 am   Your answers always make me smile. I just wanted to know how you come up with such great responses?

      i have a mantra each day when i begin questions. it's "My New Year's resolution is to do a great job on questions today"

7.30.20  5:36 am   What's your favourite piece of literature?

      relativity

7.30.20  4:50 am   Hey dude how did you get into making stuff on YouTube

      first i made stuff offline, then made a website and put it there, and then eventually due to pressure from society i put most of it on youtube as well. and more places

7.30.20  4:21 am   If you could draft a message to broadcast to space that could possibly be received by alien intelligence, what would you send?

      this planet is the message, but i am contributing to it gradually

7.30.20  3:24 am   Which is your favourite video that you've made?

      i would prefer to make a new one to be my favorite

7.30.20  3:20 am   what do you personally think the purpose of life is?

     to upset the previous status quo, of lifelessness

      what drives you?

      time and space

7.30.20  2:11 am   it seems like your passions really come naturally to you. is it weird to you when people ask for advice on how to best find their own passions?

      yes. however, i do have advice for how to avoid drowning in passion, which can be a serious issue

7.30.20  2:00 am   I just wanna say I love your videos and music

      i want to believe you

7.30.20  1:58 am   If your current project makes videomaking 2 times faster, you could do a weekly video. If it were 5 times faster, and it takes 2 weeks to make a video now, you could be uploading a video every 2.8 days + the time it takes to write the music. 5 days total?

      i think you might be forgetting that during the 2 week schedule, there was a song included with that also. Also i should mention that writing a song should probably take only 1 or 2 days at most. Making the recording should probably be a week, but i believe it's possible to do it much quicker

7.30.20  12:08 am   Opinions on food?

      it's ok
